text: Grzegorz Pawłuszek (born 25 August 1970) is a retired Polish football striker.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Lechia Gdańsk players Category:Zawisza Bydgoszcz players Category:GKS Katowice players Category:Górnik Konin players Category:Polonia Warsaw players Category:Stomil Olsztyn (football) players Category:FC 08 Homburg players Category:Eisenhüttenstädter FC Stahl players Category:Unia Tczew players Category:Association football forwards Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in Germany
title: Grzegorz Pawłuszek
